overview: Director/Producer James Deen illustrates a dark, twisted tale of ENVY. A woman (Chanel Preston) becomes consumed by feelings of jealousy for the young hussy across the street (Chloe Foster). The woman's tormented mind wanders to extreme lengths... and only extreme measures will extinguish her jealousy and ENVY.
title: James Deen's 7 Sins: Envy
